A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The writing was horrible.  It's a beautiful movie\, but the inconsistencies/plot holes\, convenient magic writing to move the characters in the direction the storyteller wanted them to go\, and the horrible treatment of Luke Skywalker\, was too much to deal with.  There are a number of excellent in depth reviews of this on YouTube\, with MauLer being one of the most detailed and pointed.  I'm so sad to see my favorite franchise treated this way.  Disney/Lucasfilm what have you done?
